title: Gesture Path
description: Real-time hand gesture recognition and path tracking using OpenCV, MediaPipe, and TensorFlow.
features: Real-Time Recognition: Tracks and classifies hand gestures using webcam input.
Preprocessing: Used NumPy and Pandas for dataset cleaning and frame filtering.
Classification: Leveraged scikit-learn models to accurately classify user gestures.
Visualization: Real-time gesture visualization with plotted paths using Matplotlib.

title: Amrit Air Quality Dashboard
description: A modern, interactive dashboard for visualizing air quality and sensor data across regions, featuring real-time map overlays, customizable controls, and live statistics.
features: Interactive Map: Visualizes air quality and sensor data with polygons and markers.
Mock & Real Data Modes: Instantly switch between demo data and live API data.
Customizable Controls: Filter by date, time, sampling period, and pollutant.
Auto-Refresh: Dashboard updates automatically at user-defined intervals.
Legend & Stats: Color-coded legend and live statistics for selected regions.
Responsive UI: Works on desktop and mobile devices.

title: Tukido
description: A comprehensive Figma design for TUKIDO, an online tutoring platform featuring both mobile and web views, interactive animations, advanced prototyping, and detailed wireframing.
features: Multi-Platform Design: Separate layouts for both mobile and web experiences.
Interactive Animations: Engaging transitions and micro-interactions throughout the user journey.
Advanced Prototyping: Clickable flows simulating real user interactions for both students and tutors.
Comprehensive Wireframes: Detailed wireframes for all major screens and user flows.
Modern UI: Clean, accessible, and visually appealing interface tailored for online education.

title: Git Connect AI
description: An AI-powered platform that simplifies collaboration by letting contributors query repositories, analyze commits, and manage team meetings intelligently.
features: AI Code Understanding: Uses Gemini and LangChain to explain complex Git codebases.
Query Repositories: Ask natural questions and locate relevant commits and files.
Meeting Analysis: Uses Assembly AI for transcript generation and documentation.
Smart Onboarding: Auto-generated insights to onboard new contributors efficiently.

title: FacePings
description: A face recognition-based attendance system built in Python using OpenCV and face_recognition for secure real-time face detection and logging.
features: Real-Time Face Detection: Uses webcam and face encodings to match known users.
Secure Logging: Logs time-stamped attendance into a local database securely.
Minimal UI: Lightweight desktop interface for quick access and monitoring.
Best Practices: Sensitive image data is securely handled and not exposed.

title: AimBooster
description: A browser-based aim training game where players must quickly shoot a moving spaceship target using keyboard/mouse interactions.
features: Dynamic Targeting: The spaceship moves across the canvas in random directions and speeds.
Hit Tracking: Maintains accuracy and hit-rate stats for every session.
Keyboard Interactions: Option to switch between mouse clicks and keyboard hits.
GSAP Animations: Smooth transitions and feedback using advanced CSS and JS animations.

title: Monsters Rolodex
description: A beginner React.js project featuring a dynamic search interface that filters a list of monsters using input from the user.
features: Real-time Search Filtering: Instant updates as the user types.
Props & State: Reinforces core React concepts with reusable components.
Static API Data Fetching: Pulls mock monster data and maps into UI cards.

title: Password Torch UI
description: A creative password visibility toggle UI using a 'torchlight' animation — when the torch is on, the password is visible, otherwise hidden.
features: Torchlight Animation: Used CSS keyframes to simulate light-on and light-off transitions.
Custom Visibility Toggle: Replaces generic eye icon with animated torch switch.
Modern UI Design: Clean, responsive layout with shadow-based depth simulation.

title: PawSwipe
description: A humorous Tinder-style swipe application for dogs and pets. Built with a minimalist aesthetic and swipe-left/right logic.
features: Swipe Interface: Left/right swipe to accept or reject dog profiles.
Card Stack UI: Dog cards dynamically update with animations and transitions.
Responsive Design: Mobile-friendly layout for pet lovers on the go.
Creative Branding: Designed to parody Tinder while offering a fun experience.

title: Servico
description: A service-based e-commerce platform to book daily services like electricians, mechanics, or chefs — complete with calendar selection and admin dashboard.
features: Booking System: Allows users to select service, date, time, and confirm bookings.
Calendar Integration: Service availability linked to custom calendar slots.
Admin Panel: Admin can manage bookings, availability, and worker assignments.
Secure Backend: API routes for authentication and data handling with JWT support.

title: System Log Analyzer
description: A blockchain-powered security solution to log, track, and verify system-level activities in real-time — built as part of SIH problem statement.
features: Event Logging: Captures system activity (file access, login attempts, etc.) and pushes it to a secure blockchain ledger.
Immutable Audit Trail: Blockchain ensures tamper-proof activity logs for forensic analysis.
Web3 Interface: Frontend dashboard to view, verify, and analyze logs in real time.
Decentralized Storage: Utilizes IPFS to store large logs while keeping hashes on-chain.

title: Social Hub Website Design
description: A feature-rich Figma project for Social Hub, a modern social networking platform. The design includes high-fidelity mockups, interactive prototypes, and advanced animations for both desktop and mobile views. The project demonstrates a complete product design workflow, from wireframing and user flow mapping to pixel-perfect UI, accessibility considerations, and developer handoff assets.
features: Multi-Device Mockups: Separate, fully responsive layouts for desktop and mobile.
Interactive Prototyping: Clickable flows simulating real user journeys, including onboarding, posting, messaging, and notifications.
Advanced Animations: Smooth transitions, hover effects, and micro-interactions using Figma’s Smart Animate and prototyping tools.
Component-Based Design: Reusable components, variants, and design tokens for scalable UI development.
Wireframes to Final UI: Complete workflow from low-fidelity wireframes to polished, branded high-fidelity screens.
Accessibility-First: Color contrast, font choices, and navigation designed for inclusivity.
Developer Handoff: Well-organized layers, naming conventions, and Figma’s inspect mode for easy collaboration with developers.

title: Shopify Store Design for Natural Homemade Products
description: A professional Figma design project for a Shopify-based e-commerce brand specializing in natural, homemade products such as ghee and oils. The project covers the full design lifecycle, including wireframing, high-fidelity mockups, interactive prototyping, and engaging animations. The design emphasizes a clean, organic aesthetic, intuitive navigation, and conversion-focused UI elements tailored for artisanal product sales.
features: E-commerce Focused: Product listing, detail, cart, and checkout flows designed for Shopify integration.
Organic Branding: Visuals and color palette inspired by natural, homemade products.
Interactive Prototyping: Clickable user flows for browsing, adding to cart, and purchasing.
Advanced Animations: Smooth transitions and micro-interactions for a delightful shopping experience.
Mobile-First & Responsive: Designs optimized for both mobile and desktop shoppers.
Component-Based UI: Reusable Figma components and variants for scalable design.
Wireframes to Final UI: Complete journey from low-fidelity wireframes to polished, branded screens.
Developer Handoff: Organized layers, clear naming, and Figma inspect mode for seamless collaboration.
